name: DUSTPOCALYPSE
description:
Warning! The game has a few bugs in the web version that we couldn't fix before the jam deadline, these bugs don't exist in the windows version! If you're getting annoyed by them and want to just enjoy the game, it's probably a good idea to just download it. We are working on fixing these and will update when the jam ends! The DUSTPOCALYPSE has arrived... as a small and cute cat, you're no match against the mutated dust bunnies. Until a Roomba with a gun shows up!

The Roomba shoots any enemies it sees, but to take full advantage of it, you must lure it around by throwing snacks! Along the way, you can also collect dust from dead enemies to level up and upgrade your and the Roomba's abilities!

Survive against waves and waves of endless enemies in this uhh... twin stick shooter?  sure lets go with that. The enemies get tougher with every round and it gets hard fast! So be sure to share your high score in the comments, and we'd love to know if you made a video or streamed the game too!

Controls

WASD to move

Left click to throw snacks

R to end run

Esc to pause

Credits

Catcube - most of the coding and all of the sound effects

Bonicle - some of the coding and all of the art

spop - playtested and made some cool fanart

All music used is by Louie Zong, you can go to their bandcamp here!

Font used is Mini Waku-Waku, which you can download from here.

We had a lot of fun making this and hope you enjoyed it, thanks for playing!
